name: SockJocks
description:
SLIDE

CLIMB

SLIDE SOME MORE

LAUNCH

CATCH ELEVATORS

WATCH YOUR FRIENDS TRY, and FAIL!

PROVE TO PROSPECTIVE EMPLOYERS YOU ACTUALLY DO SOMETHING WITH THE UNITY ENGINE!!  .. Wait, that's what I'm trying to do.

This nifty little demo showcases an integration of the Fantastic Physics driven Hexabody player controller with RootMotion's FinalIK and Normcore networking for an (almost) full-bodied player model and physics driven multiplayer gameplay.

Set against the backdrop of some ethereal AI generated patterns adapted for in-engine use by yours truly.

Platforms:

- Meta Quest 2  (APK for sideloading)

- Oculus Rift
